aesthetic_goals: No 'Default SaaS Blue' - Use Deep Ocean & Seafoam
No Boring Tables - Use Visual Cards & Kanban

usage_rules: Use 'Deep Sea' gradient ONLY for the Sidebar or Primary Action buttons (hover).
Backgrounds must be solid #F8FAFC (Slate 50) or White.
Cards must be White with a subtle border #E2E8F0.

Button.classes: rounded-full font-medium px-6 py-2 transition-all duration-300 hover:shadow-lg active:scale-95

Card.classes: bg-white border border-slate-200 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-300 rounded-xl

Input.classes: bg-slate-50 border-slate-200 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 focus:border-primary rounded-lg

Navigation.classes: h-screen sticky top-0 border-r border-slate-200 bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md z-50

KanbanBoard.classes: flex gap-6 overflow-x-auto p-6 bg-slate-50/50 min-h-[calc(100vh-100px)]

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise overlay on the Sidebar (opacity 2%) to add tactile feel.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is #0F172A (Slate 900) on light backgrounds. Use #64748B (Slate 500) ONLY for secondary text.
accessibility.focus_states: All interactive elements must have visible focus rings (ring-2 ring-primary/50).

do_not_use: Default browser scrollbars (use custom thin scrollbar)
must_do: Add 'data-testid' to all buttons and inputs.
Make the UI feel 'Beachy' via Whitespace and soft Blues, not literal beach icons.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add Outfit and Public Sans to index.html/css immediately.
2. THEME SETUP: Update tailwind.config.js with the 'Executive Coast' colors provided.
3. LAYOUT: Create a Sidebar Layout component that uses the Glassmorphism effect.
4. KANBAN: This is the core view. Make it horizontal scrolling, with 'Drag' handles on cards.
5. DASHBOARD: Use a Bento Grid (CSS Grid) for the Sales Owner Dashboard. Do not use simple rows.
6. AI COPILOT: Create a distinct visual style for AI elements (e.g., a subtle Gold/Accent border or glow) to differentiate from human data.
